{"id":1016230781,"question_id":2720,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691553402,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1016230781/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimize the Maximum Difference of Pairs","memory":"59 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minimizeMax(int[] nums, int p) {\n        // 1 1 2 3 7 10 => max ([1,1], [2,3])  // [1 10], [3 10], [2 10]\n        \n        Arrays.sort(nums);\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int st =0, ed=nums[len-1]-nums[0];\n        while(st<ed){\n            \n            int mid = st + (ed-st)/2;\n            \n            if(isOk(nums, p, mid)){\n                ed = mid;\n            }else{\n                st = mid+1;\n            }\n            \n            \n        }\n        return st;\n    }\n    \n    private boolean isOk(int[] nums, int p, int mid){\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        int cnt =0;\n        \n        for(int i=0;i<len-1; i++){\n            \n            if(nums[i+1]-nums[i]<=mid){\n                cnt++;\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return cnt>=p;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n    \n}\n\n// 1 2 2 4","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimize-the-maximum-difference-of-pairs","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
